document_data.mainbody:
Malutt Mauksoun was a retired warrior inhabiting Waterdeep, City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Malutt was the guildmaster for the Guild of Fine Carvers during the mid-to-late 14 century DR. He held the title of "First Master Carver" within the guild and worked out of the House of Fine Carversâ€“their headquarters along the High Road in the Castle Ward.
